messages.content: Ingredients: ['butter', 'red onion', 'garlic', 'shallot', 'zucchini', 'red bell pepper', 'beef broth', 'vinegar', 'worcestershire sauce', 'tomatoes', 'sugar', 'salt', 'red pepper flakes', 'bay leaf', 'thyme', 'oregano', 'orzo pasta', 'meatballs', 'potato', 'carrots', 'green beans', 'parmesan cheese'].

{"title":"savory meatball soup","ingredients":["butter","red onion","garlic","shallot","zucchini","red bell pepper","beef broth","vinegar","worcestershire sauce","tomatoes","sugar","salt","red pepper flakes","bay leaf","thyme","oregano","orzo pasta","meatballs","potato","carrots","green beans","parmesan cheese"],"instructions":["['fry the onion , garlic and shallots in butter for 5 minutes', 'add the zucchini and red pepper to the onion mixture and fry for an additional 5 minutes', 'pour the fried vegetables into your crock pot and add all the remaining ingredients', 'cook on low heat all day', 'when ready to serve garnish with parmesan cheese and enjoy']"],"macros":{"total_fat":14.0,"sugar":52.0,"sodium":49.0,"protein":25.0,"saturated_fat":25.0},"calories":335.8,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":380,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['flour', 'instant oats', 'sugar', 'baking powder', 'salt', 'baking soda', 'raisins', 'butter', 'buttermilk', 'cinnamon'].

{"title":"ila s raisin and cinnamon biscuits","ingredients":["flour","instant oats","sugar","baking powder","salt","baking soda","raisins","butter","buttermilk","cinnamon"],"instructions":["['mix all ingredients together to form dough', 'drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet', 'bake at 425 for 12-15 minutes', 'drizzle with a cream cheese frosting']"],"macros":{"total_fat":6.0,"sugar":26.0,"sodium":9.0,"protein":6.0,"saturated_fat":12.0},"calories":146.0,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":25,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['worcestershire sauce', 'light soy sauce', 'water', 'white vinegar', 'lime juice', 'garlic powder', 'black pepper', 'cumin', 'oregano'].

{"title":"d l  jardine s fajita marinade","ingredients":["worcestershire sauce","light soy sauce","water","white vinegar","lime juice","garlic powder","black pepper","cumin","oregano"],"instructions":["['combine all ingredients']"],"macros":{"total_fat":0.0,"sugar":22.0,"sodium":63.0,"protein":4.0,"saturated_fat":0.0},"calories":51.2,"diet":"","allergies":["soy"],"cookTime":10,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['artichokes', 'white wine', 'white balsamic vinegar', 'brandy', 'lemon, juice of', 'lemon, zest of', 'shallot', 'dijon mustard', 'cayenne pepper', 'olive oil'].

{"title":"grilled drunken artichokes","ingredients":["artichokes","white wine","white balsamic vinegar","brandy","lemon, juice of","lemon, zest of","shallot","dijon mustard","cayenne pepper","olive oil"],"instructions":["['steam artichokes until tender and leaves come off easily , 45 minutes to an hour', 'i like to use a pressure cooker to save time', 'be careful not to overcook , or they may fall apart during grilling', 'remove artichokes from the pot and let cool', 'cut the artichokes in half lengthwise', 'measure wine , vinegar and brandy in a glass measuring cup', 'add lemon juice , lemon zest and shallot', 'in a small ramekin , mix mustard and cayenne pepper', 'whisk in a little of the wine liquid', 'add mustard mixture to the rest of the liquid in the measuring cup , and whisk', 'pour marinade into a large ziploc bag', 'add artichoke halves and refrigerate approximately 24 hours , turning once half way through marinating time', 'this usually works best if you set the ziploc bag on a plate with all the halves spread out in one layer', 'remove artichokes from marinade', 'pour off excess by tilting them with the stem pointed at the ceiling', 'bring to room temperature', 'warm artichokes for about one minute in the microwave', 'brush both sides with olive oil', 'grill artichokes 4-5 minutes per side , or according to your grill', 'these have a delicious flavor of wine and barbecue , and are great enjoyed as is', 'alternately , you can serve these with your favorite dipping sauce']"],"macros":{"total_fat":0.0,"sugar":15.0,"sodium":7.0,"protein":11.0,"saturated_fat":0.0},"calories":275.3,"diet":"Vegan","allergies":[],"cookTime":70,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['apples', 'sugar', 'ground cinnamon', 'butter', 'bisquick baking mix'].

{"title":"apple crumble coffee cake","ingredients":["apples","sugar","ground cinnamon","butter","bisquick baking mix"],"instructions":["['preheat oven to 350 degrees', 'lightly spray an 8 x 8-inch baking dish with non stick spray', 'peel and core the apples , then slice them thinly', 'heat up a skillet over medium heat and put butter into the skillet', \"once it's melted , throw in the apple slices\", 'once the apples are softened slightly , add tablespoon ground cinnamon and cup sugar', 'stir until the sugar is melted', 'turn off the burner', 'in a medium bowl , mix the 2 cups of bisquick mix with 1 cups of water until it has a slightly thick consistency', 'add the apple mixture into the bowl of bisquick mix and stir together until blended', 'if it is too soupy , then add more mix at your discretion', 'pour the mixture into the baking dish and put it in the oven', 'set the timer for 35 minutes', \"once it's done , allow to cool slightly before serving with a side of applesauce\"]"],"macros":{"total_fat":15.0,"sugar":114.0,"sodium":22.0,"protein":6.0,"saturated_fat":20.0},"calories":308.5,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":45,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['bisquick baking mix', 'heavy whipping cream'].

{"title":"whipped cream biscuits","ingredients":["bisquick baking mix","heavy whipping cream"],"instructions":["['mix ingredients together with a fork just until moistened', 'drop by tablespoons onto sprayed cookie sheet', 'bake in preheated oven at 450 degrees for 10- 12 minutes']"],"macros":{"total_fat":16.0,"sugar":9.0,"sodium":10.0,"protein":4.0,"saturated_fat":26.0},"calories":154.0,"diet":"","allergies":["dairy","egg"],"cookTime":22,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['tea', 'orange juice', 'honey'].

{"title":"rooibos juice","ingredients":["tea","orange juice","honey"],"instructions":["['combine and pour into ice filled glasses']"],"macros":{"total_fat":0.0,"sugar":41.0,"sodium":0.0,"protein":1.0,"saturated_fat":0.0},"calories":57.0,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":2,"servings":1}

Ingredients: ['canola oil', 'yellow onion', 'basmati rice', 'ground turmeric', 'unsweetened flaked coconut', 'reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth', 'water', 'kosher salt', 'fresh ground black pepper', 'green onion'].

{"title":"coco rice with green onions","ingredients":["canola oil","yellow onion","basmati rice","ground turmeric","unsweetened flaked coconut","reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth","water","kosher salt","fresh ground black pepper","green onion"],"instructions":["['heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat', 'add onion', 'saute 2 minutes or until tender , stirring constantly', 'add rice and turmeric', 'saute until rice becomes yellow', 'stir in unsweetened coconut', 'add broth and 1 / 2 cup water', 'bring to a boil', 'reduce heat to low and season with salt and pepper', 'cover and simmer 20 minutes or until tender', 'turn off heat , uncover , and let stand 5 minutes', 'fluff with a fork', 'stir in green onions and serve']"],"macros":{"total_fat":10.0,"sugar":10.0,"sodium":4.0,"protein":9.0,"saturated_fat":17.0},"calories":245.6,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":30,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['eggs', 'water', 'salt'].

{"title":"boiled eggs","ingredients":["eggs","water","salt"],"instructions":["['place the eggs in a medium saucepan and cover with room temperature water', 'bring the eggs to a boil , remove from the heat and let sit for 8 minutes', 'shock the eggs in cold water to stop the cooking and shrink the egg from the shell', 'peel']"],"macros":{"total_fat":14.0,"sugar":1.0,"sodium":38.0,"protein":25.0,"saturated_fat":15.0},"calories":143.0,"diet":"","allergies":["dairy","egg"],"cookTime":15,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['marshmallow creme', 'light sour cream', 'lime', 'ground cinnamon', 'cantaloupe', 'mixed fruit'].

{"title":"cool calypso dip fruit platter","ingredients":["marshmallow creme","light sour cream","lime","ground cinnamon","cantaloupe","mixed fruit"],"instructions":["['in a small bowl , combine marshmallow creme and sour cream and whisk until smooth', 'zest lime with a lemon zester', 'juice lime to yield 1 tablespoons juice', 'whisk lime zest , lime juice and cinnamon into marhsmallow creme mixture', 'to be creative: cut melon in half and remove seeds', 'to use one half the melon for the container for your dip , scoop out melon to about 1 / 2\" from rind', 'fill with dip', 'cut up remaining half for fruit platter', 'serve with assorted fruit']"],"macros":{"total_fat":2.0,"sugar":40.0,"sodium":1.0,"protein":5.0,"saturated_fat":4.0},"calories":220.2,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":10,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['milk', 'half-and-half cream', 'sugar', 'eggs', 'cool whip', 'vanilla', 'salt'].

{"title":"cool whip ice cream","ingredients":["milk","half-and-half cream","sugar","eggs","cool whip","vanilla","salt"],"instructions":["['mix all together and beat well', 'pour into 1 gallon freezer and freeze', 'more milk may be added to fill freezer', 'add any king of well-drained fruit or chocolate candy , grated']"],"macros":{"total_fat":429.0,"sugar":2145.0,"sodium":78.0,"protein":270.0,"saturated_fat":924.0},"calories":5718.5,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":30,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['hamburger', 'green bell pepper', 'white onion', 'brown gravy mix', 'water'].

{"title":"incredibly simple salisbury steak","ingredients":["hamburger","green bell pepper","white onion","brown gravy mix","water"],"instructions":["['separate hamburger into 4 patties', 'brown hamburger meat in large frying pan', 'drain grease', 'in a measuring cup , measure one cup of water and empty contents of gravy packet into cup , mix well', 'add sliced onions , sliced bell pepper and gravy mix into pan', 'simmer on medium-low heat for 45 minutes , stirring every 10-15 minutes']"],"macros":{"total_fat":43.0,"sugar":12.0,"sodium":56.0,"protein":100.0,"saturated_fat":53.0},"calories":554.5,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":60,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['green cabbage', 'carrots', 'white wine vinegar', 'red bell pepper', 'green onions', 'old bay seasoning', 'mayonnaise'].

{"title":"coleslaw with old bay seasoning","ingredients":["green cabbage","carrots","white wine vinegar","red bell pepper","green onions","old bay seasoning","mayonnaise"],"instructions":["['cut the cabbage into wedges', 'cut out and discard the hard core from each wedge', 'using a food processor fitted with the slicing disk , cut the cabbage into fine shreds', 'transfer to a large bowl', 'fit the processor with a shredding disk and shred the carrots', 'add the carrots to the bowl with the cabbage', 'sprinkle the cabbage and carrots with the vinegar and mix well', 'stir in the bell pepper strips and green onion', 'add the mayonnaise and old bay seasoning and mix well', 'cover and refrigerate until chilled , at least 2 hours', 'serve cold']"],"macros":{"total_fat":15.0,"sugar":29.0,"sodium":10.0,"protein":4.0,"saturated_fat":7.0},"calories":159.1,"diet":"Vegetarian","allergies":[],"cookTime":15,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['honey graham crackers', 'instant vanilla pudding', 'instant chocolate pudding mix', 'milk', 'heavy whipping cream', 'chocolate syrup'].

{"title":"no bake pudding graham cracker cake","ingredients":["honey graham crackers","instant vanilla pudding","instant chocolate pudding mix","milk","heavy whipping cream","chocolate syrup"],"instructions":["['make both the vanilla and chocolate pudding as directed on the box', 'take the whipping cream and mix on high speed until it becomes the consistency of cool whip', 'mix the whipping cream and the vanilla pudding together', 'start layering graham crackers covered with chocolate and vanilla pudding , alternating between the two flavors', 'i always use a rectangular serving platter', 'when chocolate pudding is gone use remaining vanilla pudding mixture to cover the entire cake', 'drizzle chocolate sauce in lines across the top of the cake , take a knife and drag it in the opposite direction of the syrup lines to make a nice patter', 'refrigerate the entire cake at least 3 hours', 'the graham crackers will absorb the moister from the pudding and become soft like cake', 'cut on the corner going in to create a neat looking slice', 'good luck with leftovers because there never is any']"],"macros":{"total_fat":48.0,"sugar":112.0,"sodium":21.0,"protein":14.0,"saturated_fat":85.0},"calories":547.4,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":20,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['head of lettuce', 'celery', 'green onion', 'frozen peas', 'sliced water chestnuts', 'mayonnaise', 'sour cream', 'parmesan cheese', 'bacon'].

{"title":"mum s miracle green salad","ingredients":["head of lettuce","celery","green onion","frozen peas","sliced water chestnuts","mayonnaise","sour cream","parmesan cheese","bacon"],"instructions":["['break lettuce in pieces & line bottom of a round serving dish with them', 'layer celery , green onions , peas , and water chestnuts', 'in a small bowl , mix mayo and sour cream & spread over veggies', 'sprinkle shredded parmesan and bacon on top', 'cover and refrigerate overnight', 'fyi', 'cooking time includes refrigerated overnight']"],"macros":{"total_fat":49.0,"sugar":36.0,"sodium":23.0,"protein":26.0,"saturated_fat":74.0},"calories":447.7,"diet":"","allergies":["nuts"],"cookTime":495,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['cake', 'milk', 'cream', 'eggs', 'almond extract', 'vanilla', 'cinnamon', 'nutmeg', 'salt', 'butter', 'powdered sugar'].

{"title":"pound cake french toast","ingredients":["cake","milk","cream","eggs","almond extract","vanilla","cinnamon","nutmeg","salt","butter","powdered sugar"],"instructions":["['whisk milk , cream , eggs , and spices / flavorings together', 'heat fry pan and add enough butter to cook with', 'dip pound cake in egg mixture', 'do not over soak or your cake will fall apart', 'place in medium high skillet and cook till brown on both sides', \"be careful flipping it so it doesn't break apart\"]"],"macros":{"total_fat":12.0,"sugar":2.0,"sodium":6.0,"protein":10.0,"saturated_fat":19.0},"calories":111.6,"diet":"","allergies":["dairy","egg"],"cookTime":10,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['brussels sprout', 'olive oil', 'garlic', 'ground sage', 'fresh lemon juice', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper'].

{"title":"roasted brussels sprouts with browned garlic","ingredients":["brussels sprout","olive oil","garlic","ground sage","fresh lemon juice","salt & freshly ground black pepper"],"instructions":["['toss the brussels sprouts with half of the olive oil , 1 tsp ground sage and a generous amount of salt and pepper', 'place brussels sprouts in a baking dish coated with cooking spray', 'bake at 425 for 20-25 minutes or until spouts are crisp , yet tender', 'heat remaining olive oil in a skillet over medium heat', 'add sliced garlic and cook for about 3-4 minutes or until golden brown', 'remove from heat and stir in fresh lemon juice if using', 'add roasted sprouts to the garlic oil , and toss to combine']"],"macros":{"total_fat":11.0,"sugar":8.0,"sodium":1.0,"protein":6.0,"saturated_fat":5.0},"calories":104.1,"diet":"Vegetarian","allergies":[],"cookTime":30,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['water', 'sugar', 'espresso coffee', 'brandy', 'mascarpone cheese', 'pure vanilla extract', 'heavy cream', 'hostess twinkies', 'cocoa powder'].

{"title":"twinkie tiramisu with espresso syrup","ingredients":["water","sugar","espresso coffee","brandy","mascarpone cheese","pure vanilla extract","heavy cream","hostess twinkies","cocoa powder"],"instructions":["['espresso syrup: combine water and sugar in a small saucepan', 'bring to a simmer over medium high heat , stirring occasionally to dissolve sugar', 'remove from heat , cool and add coffee and brandy', 'mascarpone filling: beat mascarpone , sugar and vanilla until smooth', 'whip cream until soft peaks form', 'fold gently whipped cream into mascarpone mixture', 'to assemble: place a layer of the twinkie slices in the bottom of a shallow 2 1 / 2 quart baking dish', 'drizzle with half of the espresso syrup', 'spread with half of the mascarpone filling', 'repeat with the remaining twinkie slices , syrup and filling', 'smooth top with a spatula', 'cover and refrigerate for up to 24 hours before serving', 'just prior to serving , sift cocoa to lightly dust the top']"],"macros":{"total_fat":16.0,"sugar":55.0,"sodium":0.0,"protein":1.0,"saturated_fat":34.0},"calories":172.3,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":13,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['whipping cream', 'plain yogurt', 'sugar', 'lemon, juice of', 'yellow food coloring', 'lemon peel'].

{"title":"lemon sherbet","ingredients":["whipping cream","plain yogurt","sugar","lemon, juice of","yellow food coloring","lemon peel"],"instructions":["['in a bowl , combine whipping cream and sugar', 'whip with mixer on high speed until cream is stiff', 'fold in lemon juice , yogurt , and lemon peel', 'add coloring at this time , if desired', 'put in freezer', 'stir every 45 minutes until frozen']"],"macros":{"total_fat":36.0,"sugar":146.0,"sodium":2.0,"protein":6.0,"saturated_fat":74.0},"calories":375.0,"diet":"Vegetarian","allergies":[],"cookTime":315,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['flour', 'baking soda', 'butter', 'sugar', 'eggs', 'raisins', 'dates', 'semi-sweet chocolate chips', 'walnuts'].

{"title":"favorite chocolate chip and fruit bars","ingredients":["flour","baking soda","butter","sugar","eggs","raisins","dates","semi-sweet chocolate chips","walnuts"],"instructions":["['preheat oven to 350f', 'spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray', 'combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside', 'cream butter with sugar', 'add eggs one at a time', 'alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture', 'fold in remaining ingredients', 'spread evenly in prepared pan', 'bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean', 'cool and then cut into bars']"],"macros":{"total_fat":16.0,"sugar":70.0,"sodium":4.0,"protein":4.0,"saturated_fat":26.0},"calories":196.6,"diet":"","allergies":["egg","nuts"],"cookTime":45,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'egg', 'parmesan cheese', 'italian seasoning', 'garlic clove', 'onion powder', 'seasoning salt', 'pepper', 'mozzarella cheese'].

{"title":"italian chicken burgers","ingredients":["ground chicken","egg","parmesan cheese","italian seasoning","garlic clove","onion powder","seasoning salt","pepper","mozzarella cheese"],"instructions":["['combine all ingredients until well blended', 'form into patties', 'grill or cook until juices no longer pink inside', 'when i have these on a bun , i use pasta or pizza sauce as a condiment instead of the usual burger toppings']"],"macros":{"total_fat":14.0,"sugar":1.0,"sodium":12.0,"protein":62.0,"saturated_fat":21.0},"calories":224.9,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":20,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['cabbage', 'green onions', 'fried chinese noodles', 'white vinegar', 'caster sugar', 'vegetable oil', 'soy sauce'].

{"title":"sweet  n  sour crunchy cabbage","ingredients":["cabbage","green onions","fried chinese noodles","white vinegar","caster sugar","vegetable oil","soy sauce"],"instructions":["['chop cabbage into small pieces , place in large bowl', 'chop green onions , mix into cabbage', 'mix dressing ingredients well , add to cabbage and green onions', 'add crunchy noodles just before serving', 'enjoy']"],"macros":{"total_fat":82.0,"sugar":61.0,"sodium":26.0,"protein":17.0,"saturated_fat":36.0},"calories":764.2,"diet":"Vegetarian","allergies":["soy"],"cookTime":5,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['vodka', 'coffee-flavored liqueur', 'milk', 'ice', 'coca-cola'].

{"title":"colorado bulldog","ingredients":["vodka","coffee-flavored liqueur","milk","ice","coca-cola"],"instructions":["['in a large chilled glass , add vodka , kahlua , and milk', 'stir', 'add ice', 'top off with coca-cola', 'enjoy']"],"macros":{"total_fat":6.0,"sugar":36.0,"sodium":2.0,"protein":8.0,"saturated_fat":14.0},"calories":304.8,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":5,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['white chocolate baking squares', 'butter', 'sugar', 'eggs', 'flour', 'baking powder', 'salt', 'pecans'].

{"title":"white chocolate blonde brownies","ingredients":["white chocolate baking squares","butter","sugar","eggs","flour","baking powder","salt","pecans"],"instructions":["['preheat oven to 350f', 'line 8-inch square pan with foil , with ends of foil extending over sides of pan', 'grease foil', 'set aside', 'microwave chocolate and butter in large microwaveable bowl on high 1-1 / 2 minute or until butter is melted', 'stir until chocolate is completely melted', 'stir in sugar', 'blend in eggs', 'add flour , baking powder and salt', 'mix well', 'stir in nuts', 'spread into prepared pan', 'bake 30 to 35 minute or until toothpick inserted in center comes out with fudgy crumbs', 'cool in pan', 'lift out of pan onto cutting board', 'carefully remove brownie from foil', 'cut into 16 squares to serve', 'prepare batter as directed , doubling all ingredients', 'pour into 13x9-inch foil-lined baking pan', 'bake in preheated 350f-oven 40 to 45 minute or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out with fudgy crumbs', 'remove brownie from pan , using foil handles', 'cool , then cut into 32 squares to serve', 'makes 32 servings , 1 brownie square each']"],"macros":{"total_fat":18.0,"sugar":63.0,"sodium":5.0,"protein":5.0,"saturated_fat":22.0},"calories":203.8,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":65,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['melba toast', 'small shrimp', 'mayonnaise', 'parmesan cheese', 'onions', 'sesame seeds'].

{"title":"shrimp cheese broil","ingredients":["melba toast","small shrimp","mayonnaise","parmesan cheese","onions","sesame seeds"],"instructions":["['place shrimp on each round', 'combine mayo , cheese & onions', 'spoon mixture over shrimp', 'sprinkle with sesame seeds', 'place canapes on cookie sheet & broil until golden brown & bubbly', 'serve hot']"],"macros":{"total_fat":8.0,"sugar":3.0,"sodium":7.0,"protein":20.0,"saturated_fat":5.0},"calories":105.1,"diet":"","allergies":["shellfish"],"cookTime":25,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['pie pastry', 'sugar', 'flour', 'cinnamon', 'peaches', 'butter'].

{"title":"fresh peach pie","ingredients":["pie pastry","sugar","flour","cinnamon","peaches","butter"],"instructions":["['preheat oven to 400 degrees', 'line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry', 'combine the 1 cup of sugar , flour and cinnamon , mixing well', 'lightly mix in the fresh peaches and pour into the pie shell', 'dot with butter and cover with a top crust', 'prick the top crust and sprinkle with sugar', 'put the pie into a 400 degree oven and bake for 40 to 50 minutes']"],"macros":{"total_fat":15.0,"sugar":129.0,"sodium":5.0,"protein":5.0,"saturated_fat":16.0},"calories":281.5,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":60,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['onion', 'zucchini', 'green pepper', 'red pepper', 'mushrooms', 'olive oil', 'salt', 'pepper', 'tomatoes', 'garlic', 'basil', 'parsley', 'thyme', 'oregano'].

{"title":"rustic pasta sauce","ingredients":["onion","zucchini","green pepper","red pepper","mushrooms","olive oil","salt","pepper","tomatoes","garlic","basil","parsley","thyme","oregano"],"instructions":["['on a lined cookie sheet , spread onions , zucchini , pepper and mushrooms', 'sprinkle with olive oil , salt and pepper', 'roast uncovered at a 425f oven for 45 minutes', 'meanwhile bring a 28 oz can of tomatoes to a boil then simmer with the garlic', 'combine with roasted vegetables and herbs', 'after adding the vegetables and the herbs to the tomatoes simmer another 30 minutes', 'serve with freshly cooked penne or pasta of your choice', 'sprinkle with shaved parmesan cheese and freshly crushed pepper']"],"macros":{"total_fat":2.0,"sugar":28.0,"sodium":8.0,"protein":6.0,"saturated_fat":1.0},"calories":64.5,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":70,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['lemon pepper', 'granulated garlic', 'dry tarragon', 'dry basil', 'paprika', 'kosher salt', 'brown sugar', 'salmon fillets', 'lemon'].

{"title":"cedar plank salmon","ingredients":["lemon pepper","granulated garlic","dry tarragon","dry basil","paprika","kosher salt","brown sugar","salmon fillets","lemon"],"instructions":["['1', 'blend all ingredients except the fish and lemon in a mixing bowl', 'transfer , label , wrap tightly , and store at room temperature until needed', '2', 'sprinkle both sides of the salmon evenly with the dry rub and then press the seasonings into the flesh', 'refrigerate , uncovered , for at least 2 hours and up to 12 hours before cooking', '3', 'soak the untreated 3 / 8-inch cedar plank in water for 1 to 2 hours', 'preheat the grill on high', 'place seasoned salmon fillets onto the plank and squeeze lemon over them', 'place the planks on the grill , lower the heat to medium , and cover', \"cook for 8 to 12 minutes , depending on the fillets' thickness\", 'their internal temperature should be 120f remove the plank from the grill', 'serve with a hunk of lemon']"],"macros":{"total_fat":17.0,"sugar":20.0,"sodium":154.0,"protein":130.0,"saturated_fat":9.0},"calories":415.2,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":17,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['italian breadcrumbs', 'parmesan cheese', 'chicken cutlets', 'salt & fresh ground pepper', 'egg', 'tomato sauce', 'olive oil', 'mozzarella cheese'].

{"title":"easy and delicious chicken parmigiana","ingredients":["italian breadcrumbs","parmesan cheese","chicken cutlets","salt & fresh ground pepper","egg","tomato sauce","olive oil","mozzarella cheese"],"instructions":["['if using chicken breasts halve them horizontally', 'heat broiler', 'combine breadcrumbs and parmesan in a shallow bowl or ziploc bag', 'season both sides of chicken with salt and pepper', 'dip chicken in the beaten egg , then dredge in breadcrumb mixture , coating both sides', 'spread tomato sauce onto the bottom of a 10-by-15 inch baking dish', 'heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat', 'place 4 chicken cutlets in skillet', 'cook until golden , 1 to 2 minutes on each side', 'using a spatula , transfer browned cutlets to baking dish , on top of the sauce', 'repeat with remaining oil and cutlets', 'top each cutlet with a slice of mozarella', 'broil about 4 inches from the heat source until sauce is hot and cheese is melted and lightly browned in spots , 5 to 8 minutes', 'if you go longer than 5 minutes , watch carefully so the cheese does not burn', 'serve immediately']"],"macros":{"total_fat":51.0,"sugar":28.0,"sodium":71.0,"protein":124.0,"saturated_fat":60.0},"calories":658.8,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":25,"servings":1}
Ingredients: ['white chocolate baking squares', 'flour', 'baking soda', 'salt', 'eggs', 'sugar', 'oil', 'buttermilk', 'vanilla', 'bananas'].

{"title":"white chocolate banana bread","ingredients":["white chocolate baking squares","flour","baking soda","salt","eggs","sugar","oil","buttermilk","vanilla","bananas"],"instructions":["['heat oven to 350', 'lightly spray a 9-inch loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray', 'melt 4 ounces of the chocolate in a microwavable bowl at 70% power for 1 minute', 'stir and heat for 30 seconds longer until completely melted', 'set aside', 'chop remaining 2 ounces of chocolate', 'mix flour , baking soda and salt in a large bowl', 'beat eggs in a medium bowl', 'stir in melted chocolate , sugar , oil , buttermilk , vanilla and bananas', 'add to flour mixture with chopped chocolate', 'stir just until moistened', 'pour into prepared pan', 'bake 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean', 'cool 10 minutes', 'remove from pan', 'cool completely on wire rack']"],"macros":{"total_fat":272.0,"sugar":1136.0,"sodium":116.0,"protein":105.0,"saturated_fat":256.0},"calories":3764.0,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":115,"servings":1}

Ingredients: ['basmati rice', 'peanut oil', 'green onion', 'garlic cloves', 'curry powder', 'fresh ginger', 'salt', 'water', 'apples', 'crushed pineapple', 'dried apricot', 'unsweetened flaked coconut', 'of fresh mint', 'fresh cilantro', 'salt and pepper', 'mango chutney', 'lemon juice', 'canola oil', 'honey'].

{"title":"curried rice and fruit salad","ingredients":["basmati rice","peanut oil","green onion","garlic cloves","curry powder","fresh ginger","salt","water","apples","crushed pineapple","dried apricot","unsweetened flaked coconut","of fresh mint","fresh cilantro","salt and pepper","mango chutney","lemon juice","canola oil","honey"],"instructions":["['wash rice until water runs clear', 'drain well', 'in a saucepan , heat oil over medium heat', 'add the green onions , garlic , curry powder , ginger , and rice', 'saut for about 4 minutes or until the rice appears dry', 'add 1 teaspoon salt and the water', 'cover and lower the heat to low', 'cook at a gentle boil until the rice is tender and the water is absorbed', 'fluff the rice with a fork', 'cool', 'in a big bowl , add the rice , apples , pineapple , apricots , coconut , mint , and cilantro', 'stir to combine', 'dressing: add all the dressing ingredients to the container of an electric blender', 'process until smooth', 'pour the dressing over the rice mixture', 'toss to coat', 'add salt and pepper to taste', 'serve']"],"macros":{"total_fat":11.0,"sugar":86.0,"sodium":16.0,"protein":12.0,"saturated_fat":14.0},"calories":379.1,"diet":"Vegetarian","allergies":[],"cookTime":65,"servings":1}

{"title":"easy cheesecake bars","ingredients":["cream cheese","crescent rolls","egg","vanilla extract","sugar"],"instructions":["['preheat oven to 350', 'unroll 1 package of crescent rolls and pat down to seal in bottom of a 9x13 pan', 'mix both packages of cream cheese with egg yolk , sugar , and vanilla', 'spread cream cheese mixture on crescent rolls in your pan', 'unroll your second package of crescent rolls and pat over top of the cream cheese mix', 'lightly brush top of crescent roll crust with remaining egg white', 'bake at 350 for about 30 minutes or until light brown', 'cool and serve with sliced strawberries or blueberries']"],"macros":{"total_fat":18.0,"sugar":55.0,"sodium":10.0,"protein":10.0,"saturated_fat":33.0},"calories":239.7,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":40,"servings":1}

{"title":"bloody halloween cake","ingredients":["red velvet cake mix","chocolate instant pudding","eggs","oil","water","red food coloring","whipped topping","sweetened condensed milk","vanilla instant pudding mix","marshmallow cream","gummy worms","red decorating gel"],"instructions":["['mix cake mix , eggs , oil , water , and chocolate instant pudding', 'bake according to directions on box', 'let the cake cool to room temperature', 'hand-mix whipped topping , sweetened condensed milk , 2 3oz puddings , marshmallow fluff and red food coloring', 'if it needs more liquid add 1 tbsp of regular milk until you reach your preferred frosting consistency', 'add the worms and frost the cake', 'drizzle with the gel', 'happy halloween !']"],"macros":{"total_fat":33.0,"sugar":217.0,"sodium":20.0,"protein":12.0,"saturated_fat":37.0},"calories":476.6,"diet":"","allergies":["egg"],"cookTime":60,"servings":1}

{"title":"oamc chicken alfredo pizza","ingredients":["butter","heavy cream","parmesan cheese","salt and pepper","pizza crust","fresh spinach leaves","boneless skinless chicken breast halves","mozzarella cheese","swiss cheese"],"instructions":["['for sauce: melt butter in saucepan or skillet', 'add cream and bring to a boil', 'simmer 5 minutes , stirring continuously', 'add parmesan cheese , salt and pepper', 'turn off heat', 'for pizza: roll out dough to form crust', 'you may want to use a round cardboard covered with plastic', 'spread alfredo sauce evenly over crust', 'arrange spinach leaves over sauce', 'add chicken and sprinkle with cheeses', 'freeze , covering pizza with plastic wrap and heavy foil', 'serving day: place frozen pizza on pizza stone or baking pan and thaw', 'preaheat oven to 450 degrees', 'bake 15 minutes or until bubbly']"],"macros":{"total_fat":81.0,"sugar":3.0,"sodium":26.0,"protein":71.0,"saturated_fat":162.0},"calories":636.1,"diet":"","allergies":[],"cookTime":75,"servings":1}
